Active Projects: Call the GRM hotline to submit your grievance by phone
Imishinga Ikora: Hamagara umurongo wa GRM utange ikibazo cyawe kuri telefoni

Active Projects: Choose a method to file your complaint
Imishinga Ikora: Hitamo uburyo bwo gutanga ikirego cyawe

Active Projects: Complaint not found. Please check the tracking code.
Imishinga Ikora: Ikirego ntikyabonetse. Reba neza umubare w'ikurikirana.

Active Projects: Contact a field officer who can register your complaint on your behalf
Imishinga Ikora: Vugana n'umukozi w'ikigo ushobora kwandikisha ikirego cyawe

Active Projects: Enter your tracking code to check the status
Imishinga Ikora: Injiza umubare wawe w'ikurikirana kureba imimerere

Active Projects: File your grievance via web, mobile, or field officer
Imishinga Ikora: Tanga ikirego cyawe ukoresheje urubuga, telefoni, cyangwa umukozi w'ikigo

Active Projects: Get a tracking code and monitor progress
Imishinga Ikora: Habwa umubare w'ikurikirana ukurikirane aho bigeze

Active Projects: Public reports will appear here once generated.
Imishinga Ikora: Raporo rusange zizagaragara hano zimaze gutegurwa.

Active Projects: Submit through the GRM mobile application available on Android
Imishinga Ikora: Ohereza ukoresheje porogaramu ya GRM kuri Android

Active Projects: Visit the nearest GRM office to submit your complaint in person
Imishinga Ikora: Sura ibiro bya GRM biri hafi yawe utange ikirego cyawe ku muntu

Active Projects: We are here to help. Track complaints, view statistics, and submit new grievances easily.
Imishinga Ikora: Turi hano kukugufasha. Kurikirana ibirego, reba imibare, kandi utange ibibazo bishya byoroshye.

Active Projects: Web form coming soon. For now, please use one of the methods above.
Imishinga Ikora: Ifishi y'urubuga iri gutegurwa. Hagati aho, koresha bumwe mu buryo buvuzwe hejuru.
